data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Let me point out to you that you never have a nice word to say about anybody. Your ____ always ____ a ____ impact ____ the ____ you ____ them ____. Perhaps ____ should ____ being ____ positive. You might find that it will improve your relationships with others.
data.partBlankContent: Let me point out to you that you never have a nice word to say about anybody. Your comm____ always ha__ a nega____ impact o_ the peo___ you exp____ them t_. Perhaps y__ should t__ being mo__ positive. You might find that it will improve your relationships with others.
data.fullContent: Let me point out to you that you never have a nice word to say about anybody. Your comments always have a negative impact on the people you express them to. Perhaps you should try being more positive. You might find that it will improve your relationships with others.
data.answer: 我要告诉你的是，你从来不会说别人好话。你的评论总是对你所表达的人产生负面影响。也许你应该试着更积极一点。你可能会发现这将改善你与他人的关系。
